name: Goal the baby
description:
The game is about kicking a baby towards the goal and it's as simple as that it, gets more and more difficult as you progress.

Note: You can enter the stages through kicking the baby towards the goal

The controls are:

W, a, s, d --> to walk

Hold left shift -->  to sprint

Space bar --> to jump

R --> to restart

Escape --> to load menu

Left Control --> to rest the baby location in the menu

M --> to mute all sounds

P --> to mute music

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Important note : levels in part 6 doesn`t work sometimes you should restart until it's work`s ,it doesn`t take a long time.

Important note : If you encounter any glitch, you can solve it by restarting.
